Uses of Class
danbikel.parser.HeadTreeNode

  • Packages that use HeadTreeNode 
    Package Description
    danbikel.parser
    Provides the core framework of this extensible statistical parsing engine.
    danbikel.parser.util
    Utility classes for displaying and manipulating parse trees.

    • Uses of HeadTreeNode in danbikel.parser

      Methods in danbikel.parser that return HeadTreeNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HeadTreeNode HeadTreeNode.headChild()
      Gets the head child of this node.
      Methods in danbikel.parser with parameters of type HeadTreeNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Trainer.alterLowFrequencyWords(HeadTreeNode tree)
      For every Word in the specified tree, if it occurred less than Trainer.unknownWordThreshold times, then it is modified.
      protected void Trainer.collectModifierStats(HeadTreeNode tree, Subcat subcat, int gapIdx, boolean side)
      Note the O(n) operation performed on the prevModList.
      protected void Trainer.collectStats(Sexp orig, HeadTreeNode tree, boolean isRoot)
      Collects the statistics from the specified tree.
      protected void Trainer.countVocab(HeadTreeNode tree)
      Counts number of occurrences of each word in the specified tree and adds the word with this count to Trainer.vocabCounter.

    • Uses of HeadTreeNode in danbikel.parser.util

      Methods in danbikel.parser.util with parameters of type HeadTreeNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void DebugChart.downcaseWords(HeadTreeNode tree) 
      static void DebugChart.findConstituents(Chart chart, Set best, HeadTreeNode tree) 
      static void DebugChart.findConstituents(String prefix, Chart chart, Set best, HeadTreeNode tree) 
      static String DebugChart.headTreeNodeToString(HeadTreeNode node)
      Returns a string of the form [start,end,label<headWord>, <headChild>] where <headWord> is the head word and where <headChild> is either a string of the form [start,end,label] or null if the specified HeadTreeNode is a preterminal.
